sentences.sentence: The value of India decrease slightly with steady steps between 2010 and 2013, then it increase greatly by 2015; while America, China and Britain decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2015.

sentences.sentence: The value of India decrease slightly with steady steps between 2010 and 2013, then it increase greatly by 2015; while America, China and Britain decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2015.
